website_summaries.verdict: One of the only technologically advanced travel pillows available. Ergonomic design adequately supports both the neck and head for extended periods of sleep.
pros: We love how it has ventilation holes to improve airflow, for an excellent sleeping experience
cons: Some find the pillow too thick and hard

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: TO BE HONEST, I GOT THIS PILLOW WITH LOW EXPECTATIONS. MOST OF THESE GO FLAT PRETTY QUICK OR AREN'T THAT COMFY. HAVE HAD THIS FOR A FEW MONTHS NOW AND IT STILL FEELS LIKE NEW. THE MOST COMFORTABLE PILLOW I'VE EVER HAD AND MAKES SLEEPING SO MUCH BETTER. YOU WON'T BE LET DOWN. IT'S A LITERAL STEAL BECAUSE THE PRICE IS SO GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: SirBaca

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stays cool.
customer_reviews.text: 11/22/17 - initial review. Interior foam split in middle of U. The toggles also separated from ends. I will advise I slept in the pillow and it is very comfortable. 11/24/17 - Bumped review to 4 stars. Provider sent an immediate replacement and an email apologizing for the issues. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: John Adams

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is everything I hoped it would be! After a neck injury and sleeping in a recliner, I've used neck pillows for several years. I've purchased at least twenty of them trying to find the most comfortable pillow that doesn't shift, with a cover that can be washed, and isn't too thick. I used my last pillow until the cover was pinned together and the inside memory foam had spilt in half. I read the reviews and tried this one and it's just perfect! I've used it every night for several weeks now and like it better than my old pillow.
customer_reviews.author: nazek

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Sitting Up Comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I usually find travel pillows uncomfortable and unmanageable. This pillow is great. I used this pillow on my recent Europe trip (planes, trains, and cars.) It was a LIFESAVER. Honestly, I didn't realize I could sleep sitting up without getting a headache/neck ache until I used this pillow. It is rather bulky but it compresses down nicely into the little carrying bag making it a bit smaller. It's definitely worth the space, though. The ear plugs and eye mask were nice as well. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Best Neck Pillow on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This neck pillow had everything I was looking for! I wanted a black neck pillow, check! I wanted one with a removable cover, check! I wanted a memory foam neck pillow, check! I wanted one with a carrying case so the pillow wouldn't get dirty, check! I did not need the eye mask, but I am not going to complain! I really did look at many different options and this one was by far the right one to choose.
customer_reviews.author: Derek P

customer_reviews.title: A very good travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow specifically for two reasons. 1) It contains memory foam and 2) It can compress into a smaller bag that is easy to put in the bag that I take on the plane with me when I travel long distances overseas. So far, I am pleased with the pillow as it offers comfort and allows me to position my head in a way that is comfortable for me. Being able to compress the pillow to a smaller size is important as I no longer need to have a “bulky” pillow with me. I reviewed and considered more than a dozen products before I settled on this pillow. For me, this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D_Phi

customer_reviews.title: AERIS Pillow Full of Features - Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow for travel or just neck support while reading at home. It has several great features: (1) it is extremely comfortable, supporting both the neck and helping avoid the dropped chin when falling asleep in the car or on the plane; (2) it comes with ear plugs and a face mask to prevent sleep disruptions; (3) it has a carry bag that can be easily strapped to a carry on or back pack; AND, (4) it has a washable cover to keep your pillow always comfortable. I’m so pleased, I ordered a second as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great extras included
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the AERIS Travel Pillow for my first long haul flight in over 26 years! I didn't want to risk getting a pinched nerve in my neck from trying to catch some shut eye on the way there. I am very pleased with the quality of this pillow. The cover is soft and doesn't get too hot after prolonged use. The memory foam is very comfortable. This pillow can be folded which makes it great for storing in your carry on when not in use. It comes with it's own carrying bag, an eye mask and ear plugs. Very nice extra touches. A very nice value for the price. Plan on purchasing another one for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel/neck/ear pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Great travel/neck pillow! Very comfortable, not too firm, not too soft. I chose this one over some competitors because of the ventilation holes. It seemed to stay cooler than memory foam pillows we've had. Doubles wonderfully as an "ear pillow", too! I recently had an issue where I needed to keep pressure off my ear. This pillow allowed me to sleep on my side. I cinched up the bottom strap, making the pillow into a donut shape, positioned the pillow so my ear was in the space in the center - I slept straight through the whole night :-) I highly recommend this travel pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: cord ripped out in first 2 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Two minutes after I opened the package, I tried to tighten the cord that snugs the cushion around the neck. I was pulling gently. Immediately one end of the cord pulled out of the cushion. The cord appeared to be frayed where it emerged from the fabric. I will try to exchange for another. We'll see if the cord is secure in the second one, or if this is a case of cheap construction. Cushion and design seems comfortable, although the tightening cord would make it work better at preventing head from bobbing forward while sleeping in an airline type seat.
customer_reviews.author: JohnW2246

customer_reviews.title: Not cool! I bought this specifically because it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as described! No carrying case or mask?!? Not cool! I bought this specifically because it came with a case :(
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Smith Gillette

customer_reviews.title: good sleep on a plane is only a purchase away
customer_reviews.text: i bought this set for a flight to australia, but to test it out first i tried it out on an uncomfortable living room chair. i was able to fall asleep comfortably on the chair & in turn, on a 14 hour flight to australia. the eye mask and ear plugs were perfect for sleeping in hostels & even used the neck pillow as a real pillow when there was not enough support for my regular pillow. easy to travel with, as it comes with a convenient carry pack that fits everything. can't wait to use this while i travel again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only used it once on an airplane ride and ...
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once on an airplane ride and then my husband high jacked it from me. He broke is neck a bit ago and finds using these pillows when sitting around watching tv is helpful for him. he uses this one daily. the drawstring helps to keep it in place, even if he gets up to get something from the fridge. he doesn't have to remove the pillow, or have it fall off. I have also noticed he doesn't do as much readjusting. Considering investing in a second one, since he uses it daily it will wear out i am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Quiet Storm

customer_reviews.title: ... trips and decided it was time to invest in comfortable travel. I researched for quite awhile and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am going on a couple of overseas trips and decided it was time to invest in comfortable travel. I researched for quite awhile and the Aeris was the third pillow I actually tried (looked at the BCozzy and the Ttrl) and I really like it (though I haven't used it yet. This one seems to provide the support I'm looking for without choking me (I literally couldn't breathe with the Ttrl) or being too hot. I like that it can compress into the travel bag and the cover is washable. I'm looking forward to giving it a go!"
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H Rainwater

customer_reviews.title: Soft washable cover, firm cushion design, not as compact as a blow-up design
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a couple plan trips. It performed pretty well, not perfect, But as expected given all the different seat designs. Pros: Comfortable design Better support than an inflatable Nice looking Washable soft cover Travel strap for carrying Cons: Not very compactable (like a blow-up one) but as expected Some people may find the design doesn’t support their head as well. If this review has been helpful to you, please LIKE it. This is 100% my own opinion. I was not coerced into leaving a positive review, I do not know the seller, I bought this with my own money.
customer_reviews.author: Leading Image US

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is really great, even though with how small the airline seats ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my travel to Europe after reading a lot of reviews and I am a fan. The pillow is really great , even though with how small the airline seats are getting it can seem a little big on domestic flights.. I am also a big fan of the eye patch that came with it - I am a restless person, i can never sleep on flights but the eyepatch really helps me get a good nap. Its easy to pack the pillow back into its bag. I have purchased this 3 times now, my mom in law loved mine so I got one for her and one for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Anju

customer_reviews.title: Best travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: So I used this for the first time on a long road trip. I had to wake up at 4 am. I decided to try this pillow out before my other trip this year. I ended up falling asleep in the car. I was very pleasantly surprised by how comfortable and supportive it was. When I woke up, I had no kinks in my neck and was very well rested. This is the perfect travel pillow. Very highly recommend to get for your next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long flights!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I went on a 14 hour trip to China so I was able to sleep wonderfully by securing the clasp around my neck in front. Finally, no droopy head sleeping! This is actually my 3rd travel pillow, so I made sure to do research before I purchased this one.The memory foam is amazing and so is the little carrying case. The velcro holds on great, just strapped it to my luggage and it held on! The seller is also amazing and great about following up to see if the pillow met my needs. Happy I decided on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sleep pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Our black pillow arrived and we immediately tried it on. Everyone loved it!! So comfortable and soft! My family went on a 9 hour drive and we needed to take turns sleeping. Turns out Uncle Nate used it most of the time. He loved it! He was able to sleep comfortably most of the way! Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nikky

customer_reviews.title: couldn't rest on this in flight.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow didn't work at all for me. First, it took space in my luggage no matter they provide the pouch to make it smaller. Second, I couldn't rest my head and neck on this pillow that my international flight experience was not good. I ended up not using this pillow to sleep. That was better than using this. If they make more wider design, my head can rest on this better. - my head is average size by the way!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very comfortable and the removable cover is very soft. Everything fits into the bag making it very compact and easy to carry on for long flights. I also received a pair of compression socks as a free gift for ordering. My husband is a runner and uses them for recovery. He said they are the best pair he's had. They are thick like compression sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this travel pillow. It is to full in the back or something and while on the plane it pushed my neck too far forward. I could not get comfortable with it. A section of the back needs to be taken out. For me, very uncomfortable. I did not try it in the reverse position, this might have made it more comfortable, I don't know. But as is, I didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy West

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and high quality travel pillow. I have a long plane ride coming up and can't wait to try this out. In the meantime, I've been using it at my desk while I work on the computer, and even in the car a couple times. The memory foam has great support, but is also responsive. The fabric is nice and soft. The added case and eye mask are a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow set
customer_reviews.text: This travel pillow set is amazing! The pillow itself is super soft, and the memory foam makes it very comfortable to sleep on for a long time without it losing its shape. It fits nicely in its travel bag, along with the eye mask and ear plugs. The ear plugs themselves are also made of soft expanding foam that you can squeeze, put into your ear and let fill up the spaces. I've had experiences with much more uncomfortable travel pillows, or ones that could not be cleaned very easily, so I was very pleasantly surprised by this. The removable and washable cover makes it last much longer too. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest guy on the plane
customer_reviews.text: I fly over 100k miles every year and this pillow revolutionized my travel. You'll sacrifice some carry on space, but Give this a try and you will never take a long flight again without this pillow. It provides the neck support you need to sleep for a few straight hours while avoiding a stiff neck and, very importantly, it breathes! You won't get that from an inflatable pillow. It also compacts when squeezed into your bag - you won't get that from a standard neck pillow. Advice: Wear it backwards when your seat is upright and turn it around when you recline.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: but tried it out at home and it is incredibly comfortable. On previous overseas trips I tried to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it on a trip yet, but tried it out at home and it is incredibly comfortable. On previous overseas trips I tried to sleep without a pillow and suffered because of it. But I don't like the idea of carrying a bulky pillow in my carry-on. I figured I'd buy an inflatable pillow until I read about how uncomfortable they are and can even leak. When I saw this pillow can be compressed to fit inside a smaller bag, then I knew it was right for me. I also like the fact that it comes with detailed instructions about using and caring for it. I am anticipating a more restful journey on my upcoming overseas trip!
customer_reviews.author: Karen King

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this travel pillow for an upcoming redeye flight, so I have yet to use it. It compacts perfectly into the bag and there is extra room in it so it isn't a struggle to get in. It came with an eye mask and ear plugs as well, which will come in handy. There are straps in the front that you can clip together to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great neck support pillow
customer_reviews.text: --Hi--Use my pillow every night--tuck it behind my bed pillows --Use it for preventing those "cricks" in the neck after a night's sleep.has adjustable draw strings that makes the pillow "custom made" for your neck, so even if you toss and turn ,the pillow stays stable.the washability of the cover is a plus and of course take it on the plane--Best one yet
customer_reviews.author: sheila ross

customer_reviews.title: A Travel Pillow That Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best travel pillow ever! It's very supportive and the memory foam makes all of the difference. I have used pillows travelling to Europe--10 plus hours. This one holds its place because it has toggles that you tighten in the front. I slept and no neck pain. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The best love it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several foam neck pillows for traveling and I've always been disappointed but this one is really awesome, it folds up and it's very compact to carry, couldn't be happier and would highly recommend it. I really love it
customer_reviews.author: Veriferd purchaser

customer_reviews.title: A+ Comfortable Neck Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching pillows because of constant pain and tension in my neck muscles. I ordered one Aeris pillow and several other types including a blow up model, but liked this Aeris so much that I ordered a second one for my teen son and returned the others. We both used the Aeris on long flights to/from Europe (7 and 9 hours). The string connector is also a useful feature. I'm so happy with my decision - the Aeris neck pillow is perfect for us - it's high quality and very comfortable so both my son and I heartily recommend it. It may feel different for a person with a short neck.
customer_reviews.author: Winona in Tacoma

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Pillow...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the travel pillow at my door about an hour ago...long enough for me to open the boxes and view everything in them. I tried the pillow and found it to be very comfortable. I even tried folding the pillow and fitting it into the Aeris bag as described in the instructions and the mission was a success. I also tried the ear plugs and the eye mask. I am taking a trip to Europe in October so all three of these items will be a life saver during the long flight there and back. I would definitely recommend the travel pillow as a "must-have" for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Pillow package for travellers
customer_reviews.text: The Aeris Neck Pillow is a great product. I am writing my second review here, because Amazon misplaced the other one. The Neck Pillow came in a plastic bag with everything else which is described in the product information section. The Pillow feels great and is super cosy. I haven't tried to roll it and put it in the bag yet, but I received a manual via email on how to do it the right way which was very helpful. I definitely recommend this one as the whole package is a great deal for people who travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but I will be retired this travel pillow. To begin with, it is very large, too big for my head and neck to rest comfortably. Secondly, the foam is very dense and did not give much when I tested it. Perhaps if you wore it longer, it would eld to the shape of your neck but it was just too uncomfortable. I do have a smaller than average head.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Houle

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a comfortable pillow. It has a strap on the front ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a comfortable pillow. It has a strap on the front which I honestly don’t find very useful but it doesn’t bother me either. The foam used is really good, firm enough to hold my head but it’s spft enough to be comfortable. I did notice the pillow got a little bit too warm after using it for a long period of time and that might be a deal breaker for some. In my case, the temperature of the pillow is not very important. Is it perfect? No. Is it worth buying? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this, but just can't
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but just can't! I have a neck pillow I use everyday for my train commute and purchased this as a new one for my flight from the east coast to Hawaii. Unfortunately, this neck pillow is way too firm. It was so uncomfortable on the flight and virtually impossible to use with the plane seats. The quality of the pillow and cover is great, but it's just to big. I think if you could withstand the uncomfortableness until the memory foam squishes down, it would be a great pillow, but it just wasn't worth it. Wishing I didn't waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Doell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but need to make smaller with scissors to make comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and I like that it fits in a small travel bag. However, the foam is too big in the back. My head gets pushed forward on the airplane and I can't sleep due to the uncomfortable position. I was able to remove the zipped cover, cut the cloth cover away with scissors and cut some of the foam away. Hopefully, this will help on my next flight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love my pillow, it came with a eye patch, ear buds and a carrier to hold it all, the micro fiber fabric is so soft it’s really relaxing, it keeps my head steady during nap time or traveling lol
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for flights. I wish it had a flat back, it's a bit uncomfortable using on a plane with how much it sticks out in the back. Otherwise, the pillow is comfortable if you have a window seat and can use it as a pillow versus a neck pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Safe purchase, won't go wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: This one's slightly on the softer side, while I prefer something that's just a bit less soft. Having said that, my initial thoughts are that the pillow is great. I've not had a chance to travel with this yet, but it does feel more comfortable than the one I'm currently using. It should get the job done, and for this price, I wouldn't complain much.
customer_reviews.author: Harmit Jasani

customer_reviews.title: Great Support on a Long Flight!
customer_reviews.text: " I bought it for a 14 hour trip to South Africa. The experience has been great! Excellent support for my neck, no tired fatigue from sitting and head falling forward or flopping around while sleeping. Will buy another one for my wife when we travel latter next month on a nine hour flight. " The enclosed travel bag which was useful to compress the pillow when not in use (memory foam construction) was great along with the eye cover and ear plugs. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Macdoggie

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is great and the seller is better
customer_reviews.text: I originally had problems with my initial shipment of this product. I contacted the seller and my issue was resolved in less than 24 hours. Between the pillow being wonderful and the seller being attentive when issues arise, this product is the way to go. I love this pillow immensely. The neck support is great especially for someone with migraines that are aggravated by neck pain. I have used this on multiple trips already and have considered buying some for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: This is not the aeries quality I sought
customer_reviews.text: This was a second purchase since I was very happy with the first similar product I bought in 2017. The only similarities are color and name. This is a terrible product and too softly and flabby , unlike the first one was bought which was high quality and sturdy. I am very disappointed and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zachb

customer_reviews.title: it's still pretty big and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I found the material too stiff. And, even though you can stuff it down into the travel bag, it's still pretty big and bulky. It wasn't easy to strap to my carry on and be sort of out of the way. When I tried to use it on the flight, it was too bi and I would have had to recline my seat all the way back to make it so my head wasn't pushed forward and I like to avoid reclining the seat if I can. I'm pretty sure I'll look for a different one for my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: I love this big ol neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this big ol neck pillow. Used it on a three month adventure around the world and I made sure to never lose it. It's extremely comfortable and gives great neck support! It's not as small as a blow up pillow but carrying around it's large size is worth the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pillow and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I am a consultant that flies almost weekly. This pillow is my second bed! It is super supportive and the bag that it fits into makes it easily portable. I often throw it in my Longchamp! I've owned this pillow for 2+ years and I noticed my bag (not the pillow) was beginning to weaken. I sent the makers an email asking for a replacement bag, and they sent me an entire brand new pillow! Now I have 2 because my first one is still in excellent shape. I love that you can remove the cover and wash it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Worked perfectly (the neck thing that is). Eye cover and ear plugs not that big a deal, as the airline provided both in a little kit they handed out before the trans world flight to Africa. The memory foam is much nicer than the bean bag ones we saw in the airport stores. The little carry case is nice also, just stuff the thing back in there when finished and shove in your carry on. No wearing around your neck as you exit the aircraft and look like a dork.
customer_reviews.author: Myohmy

customer_reviews.title: Good Airplane Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of different pillows & this one is good. I bought several different pillows to compare during an overseas trip earlier this year & I prefer the "j" hooked pillow.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This was delivered on time and has a nice, small carrying case. It fits well and has a nice closure. Cover can be taken off and washed. It can be a little hot on those extra steamy days, otherwise I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: this works great have used it plenty of times including once in ...
customer_reviews.text: i got it for when i sleep in my mv between jobs. getting older and could start to feel neck pain from sleeping in my car between jobs. this works great have used it plenty of times including once in the house when it first arrived and i tried it while watching tv reclining in my chair and i woke up with no pain. highly recommend. update it was so nice i brought it twice! i sleep in my recliner so often it made sense to buy a 2nd and since then i have not had a sore neck. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J R W

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: "I bought the travel pillow because we are taking a red eye to New York from San Diego and I need to be able to sleep on the plane. I chose your product because when I searched best travel pillows on the internet, your product popped up, I liked that it was memory foam and it had the eye mask and ear plugs included, I also liked that it came with a travel pouch and was compact when traveling. I look forward to using it on my trip."
customer_reviews.author: EEnniss

customer_reviews.title: ... me the eye shades and the ear plugs were pretty redundant in the package
customer_reviews.text: For me the eye shades and the ear plugs were pretty redundant in the package. They are both basic quality and I don't like the foam ear plugs. The main reason I got this was for the pillow and I'm very pleased with it. It's incredibly comfortable and compresses down to a good size in the carrying bag. The cover can be taken off for cleaning and is very soft. I also think the air holes in the foam will make a positive difference to temperature/comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: We totally LOVE our new neck pillows. We leave for Europe next week and we have been "practicing" with our pilllows in preparation. I KNOW we'll be fine. Thank you! Additionally the seller has reached out to us to make recommendations regarding our product. WELL RECEIVED! Thank you even more!
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: The best travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is the best travel pillow I've ever used. It is supportive, yet soft. The material feels very nice. It takes a few tries to figure out how to fold it, but once you do, it takes very little space. Overall, I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable neck pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy neck pillow. With no driving going on right now i tried this pillow on watching TV on the couch last night. It was nice with no neck snapping around while i dozed off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cleary

customer_reviews.title: and it is comfortable. I needed it because I just had surgery ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the pillow sooner than expected, and it is comfortable. I needed it because I just had surgery and at times it is easier to nap in the chair. The pillow helps my neck feel better and not get stiff. Your pillow had the best reviews, the price is reasonable, and the reviews said the customer service was great. Your email requesting feedback on satsfaction and including the instructions verified that. I also need the pillow for long,12 hour car trips! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy travel pillow Ive come across
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of binge watching series and frequent Vegas trips. I've seen lots of people with these types of pillows, didn't like how they felt when I tested them. Saw your ad on Facebook and decided to try it out. Great promotion and no harm, no foul. Amazing product. Super quality memory foam. Its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sharice Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super Supportive Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and color of the pillow. The purple color is exactly as vibrant as its pictured, and I love that it's removable/washable as well. The foam is feels very supportive and I like that there's a clasp in the front of the pillow is perfect to stop the pillow from sliding off. Currently I use it for playing computer games for hours on end, and that helps a lot with the neck strain. Can't wait to try it out on a long flight! The sleeping mask is also a nice addition, nice and lightweight so that I can barely feel it while I'm wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Deon

customer_reviews.title: Works great everywhere... not just in airplanes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow and I take it wherever I go. I use it in the car for longer trips and I have actually used it at Disney. Being in a wheelchair, I'm always looking for comfort and I like to take afternoon naps - even if it's just for a few minutes. This pillow is both compact and versatile (does muffle sound, too) and compared to others I've used, is really an amazing product at a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: John M. Augello

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I use to hate travel pillows, but that was because I had one with those styrofoam beads. This one is memory foam and provides sturdy support. I'm 6'5" and I can never get a nap in on planes. That changed when I got this one. Highly recommended! ***UPDATE*** - A few months in one of the toggles/strings came off (how, I'm not sure). I emailed the company and they sent me a replacement with no questions asked. I'd give 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Robb Fladry

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are that it feels great and I love the fact that it can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today but will be using it for about 16 hours worth of flights coming up. Will update my review if I have any issues. First impressions are that it feels great and I love the fact that it can be compacted somewhat and stored in the included bag. I also like that I can attached it onto my backpack in the airport, which saves space and keeps me hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly M.

customer_reviews.title: How to return for lifetime guarantee???
customer_reviews.text: Aeris, how do I return this for my lifetime guarantee? The foam has split in half after two years! Edit: 03/04/2019 Great follow up from Matt, has already mailed out a replacement to me. I love this pillow!!!
customer_reviews.author: dream weaver

customer_reviews.title: Super Travel Friendly
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is great. I love that you can fold it up and stick it in the case. The only issue is that it doesn’t go up high enough to fully support my neck, but the compactness of it makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Item is soft, compact and comfortable. Love the flexibility on how you could just fold it in as supposed to the big travel pillow ls out there where it gets a bit clumsy trying to find a place to clip on your bag or suit case. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. Maybe I don't have experience with enough of these pillows to know what a 1* and a 5* are? It's a bit firm, but I don't know why you'd want it floppy soft, so, I'm just fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruch

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Never cared to use a neck pillow, due to the added hassle of carying one. Recently bought this and its wonderful, considering how inhumane cabins are designed today. No neck pain, no head falling and as good sleep as possible under current conditions. Plus its easy to store and carry without getting it dirty. Didnt care for the extras though, I would prefer to have a lower price without the earplugs and eye cover.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow133

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service!!! 100/10
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is super comfy, but after 1 trip the zipper to the cover was jammed and i could no longer close the cover over the pillow. After sending an email to the company and seeing if i could get a new cover, they quickly responded and sent a whole new pillow set. Such a great product and even better customer service
customer_reviews.author: Kris Salvatera

customer_reviews.title: As good as the reviews indicate
customer_reviews.text: I recently started travelling on a weekly basis and have been experiencing significant neck and upper back pain - both while travelling and once home. My chiropractor recommended I get a travel pillow to help. I purchased this one based on the available reviews. It is much more comfortable than a previous brand I had tried. The foam is soft, yet supportive. The cover is very comfortable against my skin (which can be sensitive). I am even wearing it while sitting at my desk to help ensure proper alignment is maintained. It is definitely offering me relief from the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Comfort, Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This travel pillow is extremely comfortable. It allows your neck to rest comfortably in the pillow regardless of position thus eliminating the neck pain or soreness that you may experience with other pillows that force your neck slightly forward. I always travel with this pillow whether its a trip in the car or a cross country flight. I don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: Ada8705

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I had many pillows but this one is really nice and lightweight. Also the design with the holes in the foam are really nice. The hot air does not get trapped inside. It is very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri C

customer_reviews.title: Just Squishy Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for international flights, but most recently I used it when we drove 10 hours to Utah for a reunion. I've never enjoyed the journey so much (hated it so little?) and I know it's because I slept through a huge portion of it thanks to this.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, thick, and compact
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I was shocked when I felt how cushy the product is. I love that you can fold it and synch it down into its little draw string pack. It's compact and fits securely in my backpacking bag. The pillow fits around the neck and the pull cord brings the two ends together to keep the head from falling forward if person is sleeping upright (like on a plane). Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected...
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is much smaller than expected... string digs into neck when pulled snug, but if you don't pull tight it will not stay in place... pillow gets too warm after being worn a short time. Comes with a storage bag, - it's not big enough to store pillow, but too big for the eye mask and ear plugs. Will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Beckie Jo Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works as required
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but is very warm for hotter climates. Central Texas is almost always too warm and this pillow makes my neck sweat even though the a/c is on. Very comfortable otherwise. Can't lay back flat on my bed due to thyroid and hyper-parathyroid issues so this pillow is in addition to a regular pillow. Update: The Seller stands behind their product. Received a replacement and it is very comfortable. Hubby keeps stealing it from me for travel
customer_reviews.author: TXk

customer_reviews.title: A1 memory pillow
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and read lots of reviews b4 I settled on this pillow... 3yrs later, it's held its shape and is soooooo comfortable... Con: does have a smell out the packaging.. wash the pillow cover and let the pillow air out for a few days b4 u put it back on
customer_reviews.author: Randi J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Just got the pillow and already had a chance to use it. I dont like sleeping on normal pillows and this will be my everyday pillow. Its memory foam and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Luparapa

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: "We bought for daughter who has to fly different places throughout the year and she is so happy with pillow set. Easy to travel with and can be washed! Very comfy too."
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Neck Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, the memory foam is just the right amount of cushion and has a nice soft fabric cover. Comes with a sturdy compression carrying bag for storage that packs it down nicely for going through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Carrying Case
customer_reviews.text: This travel pillow is very soft and I like that the cover is removeable for cleaning. I especially like that it fits into a travel bag, rather than having to carry around a bulky pillow. I did find that for my neck, it was a little too big, so that it wasn't completely comfortable. Maybe I just have a short neck? It did allow me to catch a few hours of sleep on a 12 hour flight.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really support your head that much
customer_reviews.text: Packs small, but doesn't really support your head that much. It doesn't seem to get snug enough around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mickey

customer_reviews.title: I'm tall and it's hard to get comfortable anywhere. I was skeptical of these pillows but ...
customer_reviews.text: I can never sleep on planes or cars or anything moving. I'm tall and it's hard to get comfortable anywhere. I was skeptical of these pillows but gave it a shot and that was it, slept like a baby (a baby that sleeps I suppose) on all of my 6 flights to and throughout Europe. I'd recommend to wear it sideways or backwards so your head doesn't fall forward when you fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam is so much more comfortable than the inflatable travel pillows and unlike the bead ...
customer_reviews.text: The first thing we noticed about our Aeris Travel Pillow is how soft it is. The memory foam is so much more comfortable than the inflatable travel pillows and unlike the bead filled pillows, you don't have to worry about beads falling out if it gets a small hole. We also liked the fact that it has a travel case to keep it clean and make it easier to transport. The case has a velcro strap to attach to a carry on bag too. The pillow cover is removable for cleaning. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but the smell...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. I liked the collapsibility and the tie. But man, the smell! I ended up returning it because I doubt breathing that in was good for me. No thanks!
customer_reviews.author: randomtuesday

customer_reviews.title: 5 hour flight and it provided me with great neck and head support allowing for comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: used this pillow on a 7.5 hour flight and it provided me with great neck and head support allowing for comfortable sleep. it is easy to adjust or turn depending on personal neck contour. Matt in customer service promptly provided me with a replacement pillow, no questions asked, when there was a slight issue (most likely user error). i've used a few pillows in the past and this one is far superior to the rest while having the right price! I highly recommend this product. thanks Matt !
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’m thrilled with this product. I had my C5-6 repaired and fused. I have trouble with my neck during car rides. This work great. Very comfortable. I would highly recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY COMFORTABLE FOR AIRPLANE AND BUS TRIPS. MY HEAD DOESN'T DANGLE WHEN I DOZE OFF. LOVE THE MICROFOAM COMFORT!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great neck pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This saved my life on my 25hr trip from New York to Mauritius. I have arthritis so can’t roll it up into the bag, but the clips were helpful to keep it tied to my luggage when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: dranw

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband when we go in trips, it is very nicely made it even came with ear plugs ant an eye mask. Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: BEST TRAVEL PILLOW EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best travel pillow ever. Extremely comfortable- wore it for 8 hour flight to Europe. Also wore it on long (6+hours) train rides. So convenient and quick to store in the little bag, and the bag easily attaches to the outside of your bag or fits in a bigger travel bag. It folds into the bag in seconds, and provides different levels of plumpness. STRONGLY recommend if you don't have a travel pillow or you have one that is bad, hurry up and get this one. It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Saienni

customer_reviews.title: This is extremely plushy and comfortable. Not as small and squishable as some other ...
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely plushy and comfortable. Not as small and squishable as some other neck rests, so if space is a premium for you, this might not be the model you want. but if comfort is your priority, this is very nice. Also came with a sleep mask and earplugs and I like that it has a travel pouch so the pillow doesn't get dirty transporting. I don't understand what the cord with toggles on each end is for - ???
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam makes this travel pillow so comfortable. And it came with ear plugs, eye mask and a storage case that makes it easy to transport. The cover over the memory foam is removable so you can wash it if needed. And it’s smaller than the ones at the airport so it’s less bulky. Great product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: This one is nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: It definitely made my international trips a lot more bearable. Most travel pillows are very weak, and are not able to really support anything. This one is nice and thick, and the memory foam really holds my head up. The only downside would be that it doesn't dissipate heat very well, but I tend to run hot regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: A very good product for those individuals that like to have support where is needed the most!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many travel pillows and this one is top-notch. My favorite feature is the stuff-bag it comes with. You can pack it nicely in the bag and velcro it to the outside of a backpack or roll-bag handle. Supportive and comfortable with perforation to help manage overheating. Overall nice product.
customer_reviews.author: TheBigIke

customer_reviews.title: Too wide to be comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow for an international flight, and it was too wide. I couldn't get comfortable while wearing it, so I tried moving it to my shoulder to maybe lean into it, and that was worse. Ended up throwing it into my luggage for the rest of the trip. Wish I could return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, but works better in the reverse position!
customer_reviews.text: Held up under use and stored easily in its nylon bag. I used the collar backwards as it was a bit thick in the back and would keep my head leaning forward. Turning it around worked perfectly and kept my head tilted back and straight, and the sides kept my neck from becoming sore.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Driver

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow. A must have for long travels.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pillow. I love the fact that it is memory foam. Just be prepared that it will be a bit hard at first but then with use it will softnen significantly. This is the main characteristic of memory foam pillows. I think this is a great item to have for long travels. The mask and earplugs were also included in the shipment as described. Overall very satisfied'.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pillow compresses well for easy packing
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable travel pillow which compresses down for easy packing. I've had the pillow for over a year and it's held up with weekly use. Over time the little nylon carry bag started to wear down and the company sent me a replacement so I could continue packing the pillow on long trips. Definitely recommend the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: triman247

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Compact Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought to for my wife and I. Used them on a flight from Houston to Bangkok. Easy to carry due to compact size and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: stoogie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the car because I need support on my neck. I love this. So much better than the inflatable one I have. I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dundee

product_meta.title: AERIS Memory Foam Travel Pillow for Airplanes - Best Airplane Neck Pillow for Long Flights - Plane Accessories Easy to Carry Bag to Save Space, Ear Plugs and Eye Mask - Perfect Flight Set & Gift
feature_bullets: ✈ #1 BEST COMPACT TRAVEL PILLOW! Easily fold up your AERIS Neck Pillow, and bring it with you anywhere! It comes with a BONUS travel bag to carry it. Your travel pillow packs up small, and doesn't take up a lot of room in your carry on. Plus, it has a velcro strap to attach to your luggage so that you don't have to worry about dropping your pillow, and getting it dirty. Or, having the inconvenience of walking with it around your neck— like other u-shaped pillows.

💤 MOST COMFORTABLE NECK PILLOW + FLEXIBLE DESIGN— If you want a travel pillow to hold your head up in total comfort and support, then you found the winner! Our Aeris Travel Airplane Pillow is the most comfortable travel pillow you will ever own. It makes sleeping so much better while you fly!

✈ EASY TO CLEAN WITH REMOVABLE COVER: Did you know that the outer pillow cover is made with extremely soft velour fabric, and is removable? Now you can easily remove the pillow cover after you travel, and wash it in your washing machine!

✈ REVOLUTIONIZE THE WAY YOU TRAVEL WITH OUR COMPLETE TRAVEL SET! If you are ready to travel in complete comfort and relaxation, then you will fall in love with our Aeris Travel Pillow Set! It comes with an eye mask, ear plugs, and compact carrying bag for your pillow! Enjoy using your pillow at home browsing the net, watching TV, reading a book, relaxing in a regular chair, and traveling in cars, buses, trains, and airplanes.

🎁 PERFECT GIFT IDEA! Do you know someone who loves to travel? Our high-end travel pillow set makes a great gift for family members, friends, and commuters of all ages! You can use it laying around your house as your daily pillow, or take it backpacking, or even take it to school to nap between studies or at work!
